subject: upgrading to junit4: no test found
msgSnippet: I tried to upgrade 2 test classes into annotateted tests by changing public void testXXX() into import org.junit.Test; ... @Test public void XXX() One test
messageBody:
I tried to upgrade 2 test classes into annotateted tests by changing

public void testXXX()

into

import org.junit.Test;
...
@Test public void XXX()

One test works fine
http://code.google.com/p/bobbinwork/source/browse/trunk/JUnitTests/nl/BobbinWork/diagram/math/TestNearestPoint.java?r=164

The other not (still the pre-annotated version):
http://code.google.com/p/bobbinwork/source/browse/trunk/JUnitTests/nl/BobbinWork/diagram/math/TestAnnotations.java?r=161

They used to work both before annotation and I fail to see the
essential difference.

Whether running with eclipse or Ant I get
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: No tests found in
nl.BobbinWork.diagram.math.TestAnnotations
